description: Gets information about the active (live) stream on a specified channel.

parameters.name: channelArn
parameters.description: Channel ARN for stream to be accessed.

nested_items.name: playbackUrl
nested_items.description: URL of the master playlist, required by the video player to play the HLS stream.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: Time of the stream's start. This is an ISO 8601 timestamp; note that this is returned as a string.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The stream's state. Do not rely on the OFFLINE state, as the API may not return it; instead, a 'NotBroadcasting' error will indicate that the stream is not live.

nested_items.name: streamId
nested_items.description: Unique identifier for a live or previously live stream in the specified channel.

nested_items.name: viewerCount
nested_items.description: A count of concurrent views of the stream. Typically, a new view appears in viewerCount within 15 seconds of when video playback starts and a view is removed from viewerCount within 1 minute of when video playback ends. A value of -1 indicates that the request timed out; in this case, retry.
